metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12627 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Apache Xerces-C XML Parser library before 3.2.1, processing of externalDTD paths can result in a null pointer dereference under certainconditions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12627` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxerces-c-samples - 3.1.1-5.1+deb8u4build0.14.04.1
libxerces-c3.1 - 3.1.1-5.1+deb8u4build0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-5.1+deb8u4build0.14.04.1').
